title: Find the Exponential Growth and Decay Equation
text: For an original amount, $$A_0$$ , that grows or decays at a rate, k, for a certain time, $$t$$, the final amount, A, is:\n$$A=A_0 e^{k t}$$
speech: For an original amount,    a sub 0  , that grows or decays at a rate, k, for a certain time,  t , the final amount, A, is:\n   a is equal to,   a sub 0, e raised to the k t power

title: Subsitute the Values into Equation to find k
text: $$A=300$$, $$A_0=100$$, $$t=3$$ $$300=100e^{3k}$$ Solve for k and get $$k=(ln$$ (3))/3 which approximately equal $$0.366$$.

title: Subsitute the Values into Equation to find new A
text: We use this rate of growth to predict the number of bacteria there will be in $$24$$ hours. Plug in $$A_0=100$$, $$k=0.366$$, $$t=24$$ get A=100*e**(24*(ln (3))/3) which approximaely equal $$656100$$.
